item.title: Today is the start of not same same bar
item.author: yourname@example.com (yourname)
item.description: Not same same bar to open today by the most beautiful woman in the world :) daily sales Juli 1 - $191 Update; Smile Bar in Siem Reap 2018 Steady monthly profit

item.author: yourname@example.com (yourname)
item.description: About pernetic2. Appernetic.io’s friend and business partner for a long time. I have now started beta and ceta testing the site as much as possible for your benefit. Also the product is tested from rural Cambodia in gsm-mode to test my own patience as user. This blog is the start of my memoirs book. Working name: How I got two wifes in Cambodia (against my will) https://www.facebook.com/AngkorSuperShake/photos/a.582180581883843.1073741829.574114832690418/966531053448792/?type=3&theater

item.title: gsm
item.author: yourname@example.com (yourname)
item.description: In Khmer Rouge era the Chinese built this air strip. It is a long runway, I would imagine a big commercial plane could land here at any moment. https://en.m.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kampong_Chhnang_Airport The strip was built deep inside Cambodia to counter the Vietnam war and facilitate Chinese warplanes. “Henry A. Kissinger approved each of the 3,875 Cambodia bombing raids in 1969 and 1970” — the most secretive phase of the bombing — “as well as the methods for keeping them out of the newspapers.

item.title: Captain Morgan

item.description: Captain Morgan Captain Morgan is on the top of the list to expand brand to The Smile Bar in Siem Reap
